entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -1.2°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 4.8 km

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
